Overview

We offer exceptional service with complimentary hugs.

Principal is an operator and dealmaker with a track record of acquiring, managing, and growing lower middle market businesses across a range of industries, from manufacturing to healthcare.

V Capital aims to build a lower middle market acquisition platform around a philosophy similar to that of companies like Danaher and Roper, focusing on complex manufacturing, engineered products, and healthcare.

V Capital is looking to partner with long-term investors on individual transactions for direct investments, where V Capital will handle sourcing deals, executing transactions, and managing the companies.

V Capital is not looking for management fees, only performance-based carried interest.

PRINCIPAL PROFILE

Comprehensive experience acquiring and growing a broad range of operationally complex businesses, ranging from manufacturing to health insurance.

Clover Health (Sequoia Capital portfolio): Director of Finance and Operations, 2015-2017

Startup Medicare Advantage health insurance plan.

Sensata Technologies (Bain Capital Portfolio): Director of M&A and General Manager, 2012-2015

$7B public industrial sensing and automation technology company.

United Technologies Corp: Engineering Lead, 2006-2010

$90B public diversified technology conglomerate.

Education

Columbia University, MBA, 2012

Columbia University, M.Sc., Operations Research, 2010

University of Connecticut, B.Sc., Mechanical Engineering, 2006
